resources.string: Robot Gripper Controller is an application that assist rescue squads. You can start the video by pressing "Start Video" button. You can control robot manually by pressing "Manual Control" button.This moves you on new screen which provide controls to control the gripper of the robot. When video is active then you can pop up the menu to press the android device menu button. Menu allows you Start automatic mode, Connect to Arduino, and Connect to Laptop options . When you choose "Start Automatic Mode" option, application will start to control gripper of robot automatically.When you select "Connect to Arduinop" option, application will connect to arduino device over Bluetooth or USB. When you select "Connect to Laptop" option, application will connect to latop over Wi-Fi.
